docs: Main program module for the Carsa loyalty program
Manages Lokal token minting, distribution, and redemption

instructions.name: deposit_voucher
docs: Deposit voucher tokens into the staking pool using delegated authority
The user must have previously approved the pool delegate
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `amount` - The amount of voucher tokens to stake
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: user
docs: The user whose tokens are being deposited

accounts.name: pool_delegate
docs: The delegate authority executing this instruction on behalf of the user
Must match the pool_delegate in pool_state

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account

accounts.name: user_stake_record
docs: User's stake record (created if doesn't exist)

accounts.name: user_voucher_ata
docs: User's voucher token account (source)

accounts.name: pool_vault_ata
docs: Pool vault token account (destination)

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program for account creation

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token program for SPL token operations

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Legacy initialize function for backwards compatibility
This will be removed in future versions

instructions.name: initialize_lokal_mint
docs: Initialize the Lokal token mint and program configuration
This instruction sets up the SPL token mint with the program as authority
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: update_authority
docs: The authority that can update the mint configuration
This should be the program deployer or designated admin

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account for Lokal tokens
This will be created and owned by the SPL Token program

accounts.name: mint_authority
docs: Program Derived Address that acts as the mint authority
This ensures only the program can mint new tokens

accounts.name: config
docs: Configuration account that stores mint metadata and settings
Uses PDA to ensure uniqueness and program ownership

accounts.name: token_program
docs: SPL Token program required for mint operations

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program required for account creation

accounts.name: rent
docs: Rent sysvar required for rent exemption calculations

instructions.name: initialize_pool
docs: Initialize a new voucher staking pool for LOKAL tokens
Creates the pool state and configures staking parameters
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `config` - Pool configuration including stake limits and APY
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: pool_authority
docs: The authority that manages the pool (admin)

accounts.name: pool_delegate
docs: The delegate authority that can execute deposits on behalf of users

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account (PDA)

accounts.name: vault_ata
docs: The vault token account that will hold staked voucher tokens
Must be initialized before calling this instruction

accounts.name: pool_vault_authority
docs: The vault authority PDA (owns the vault_ata)

accounts.name: voucher_mint
docs: The voucher token mint (LOKAL token)

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program for account creation

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token program for SPL token operations

instructions.name: mint_lokal_tokens
docs: Mint Lokal tokens to a user's token account
Used for reward distribution when users make purchases at merchants
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `amount` - The amount of tokens to mint (in smallest unit, considering 9 decimals)
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that can mint tokens (must be the update authority)

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account for Lokal tokens
Must match the mint stored in config

accounts.name: mint_authority
docs: Program Derived Address that acts as the mint authority

accounts.name: config
docs: Configuration account containing mint settings

accounts.name: destination
docs: The token account that will receive the minted tokens
This should be the user's associated token account for Lokal tokens

accounts.name: token_program
docs: SPL Token program for mint operations

instructions.name: process_purchase
docs: Process a purchase transaction and distribute reward tokens with optional token redemption
This is the core instruction that implements the loyalty program logic
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `fiat_amount` - The fiat payment amount in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR)
* `redeem_token_amount` - Optional amount of tokens to redeem as payment
* `transaction_id` - Unique identifier for this transaction (32 bytes)
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: customer
docs: The customer making the purchase

accounts.name: merchant_account
docs: The merchant account receiving the purchase

accounts.name: mint
docs: The Lokal token mint

accounts.name: mint_authority
docs: Program Derived Address that acts as the mint authority

accounts.name: config
docs: Configuration account containing mint settings

accounts.name: customer_token_account
docs: The customer's token account that will receive the reward tokens and source for redemption

accounts.name: merchant_token_account
docs: The merchant's token account (required when redeeming tokens, otherwise can be any account)

accounts.name: transaction_record
docs: Purchase transaction record for tracking

accounts.name: token_program
docs: SPL Token program for mint operations

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program required for account creation

instructions.name: record_yield
docs: Record yield earned from staking activities
Called by the backend after swapping vouchers to SOL and earning yield
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `sol_amount` - The amount of SOL yield earned
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: pool_delegate
docs: The pool delegate authority (backend service)

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account

instructions.name: redeem_voucher
docs: Redeem staked vouchers and claim earned yield
Allows users to unstake their tokens and withdraw
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `amount` - The amount of voucher tokens to redeem
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: user
docs: The user redeeming their stake

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account

accounts.name: user_stake_record
docs: User's stake record

accounts.name: user_voucher_ata
docs: User's voucher token account (destination)

accounts.name: pool_vault_ata
docs: Pool vault token account (source)

accounts.name: pool_vault_authority
docs: Pool vault authority PDA (signer for transfer)

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token program for SPL token operations

instructions.name: register_merchant
docs: Register a new merchant in the Carsa loyalty program
This instruction creates a merchant account with specific cashback rates
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `name` - The merchant's display name (max 32 characters)
* `category` - The merchant's business category (max 16 characters)
* `cashback_rate` - The cashback percentage in basis points (e.g., 500 = 5%)
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: merchant_owner
docs: The merchant's wallet that will own this merchant account

accounts.name: merchant_account
docs: The merchant account to be created
Uses PDA for security and to prevent duplicate merchants

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program required for account creation

instructions.name: transfer_tokens
docs: Transfer Lokal tokens between user accounts
Enables peer-to-peer token transfers within the ecosystem
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `amount` - The amount of tokens to transfer (in smallest unit, considering 9 decimals)
* `transaction_id` - Unique identifier for this transaction (32 bytes)
* `memo` - Optional memo describing the transfer (max 64 characters)
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the tokens

accounts.name: sender_token_account
docs: The sender's token account

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: The recipient's token account

accounts.name: config
docs: Configuration account containing mint settings

accounts.name: transfer_record
docs: Transfer record for tracking

accounts.name: token_program
docs: SPL Token program for transfer operations

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program required for account creation

instructions.name: update_merchant
docs: Update merchant settings such as cashback rate and active status
Only the merchant owner can perform this operation
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `new_cashback_rate` - Optional new cashback rate in basis points
* `is_active` - Optional new active status for the merchant
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: merchant_owner
docs: The merchant's owner wallet

accounts.name: merchant_account
docs: The merchant account to update

instructions.name: update_pool_config
docs: Update pool configuration settings
Only the pool authority can perform this operation
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The instruction context containing required accounts
* `new_config` - New pool configuration parameters
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Success or error result

accounts.name: pool_authority
docs: The pool authority (admin)

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account

errors.name: MintAuthorityMismatch
errors.msg: Mint authority mismatch - the provided mint authority does not match the expected PDA

errors.name: UpdateAuthorityMismatch
errors.msg: Update authority mismatch - only the designated update authority can perform this action

errors.name: InvalidMintAmount
errors.msg: Mint amount cannot be zero

errors.name: MintAmountTooLarge
errors.msg: Mint amount exceeds maximum allowed per transaction

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow occurred during calculation

errors.name: MintNotInitialized
errors.msg: The Lokal token mint has not been initialized

errors.name: InvalidPurchaseAmount
errors.msg: Purchase amount cannot be zero

errors.name: PurchaseAmountTooLarge
errors.msg: Purchase amount exceeds maximum allowed per transaction

errors.name: MerchantNotActive
errors.msg: Merchant is not active or has been deactivated

errors.name: InvalidCashbackRate
errors.msg: Invalid cashback rate - must be between 0 and 10000 basis points

errors.name: InvalidMerchantName
errors.msg: Merchant name is too long or contains invalid characters

errors.name: InvalidMerchantCategory
errors.msg: Merchant category is invalid or not supported

errors.name: MerchantOwnerMismatch
errors.msg: Only the merchant owner can perform this action

errors.name: ZeroRewardCalculation
errors.msg: Reward calculation resulted in zero tokens

errors.name: InvalidTransferAmount
errors.msg: Transfer amount cannot be zero

errors.name: TransferAmountTooLarge
errors.msg: Transfer amount exceeds maximum allowed per transaction

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient token balance for transfer

errors.name: InvalidRedemptionAmount
errors.msg: Redemption amount cannot be zero

errors.name: RedemptionAmountTooLarge
errors.msg: Redemption amount exceeds maximum allowed per transaction

errors.name: SelfTransferNotAllowed
errors.msg: Cannot transfer to the same account

errors.name: RedemptionMerchantNotActive
errors.msg: Redemption not allowed - merchant must be active

errors.name: InvalidDiscountPercentage
errors.msg: Invalid discount percentage - must be between 0 and 100

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount - must be greater than zero and within limits

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized - only the pool authority can perform this action

errors.name: UnauthorizedDelegate
errors.msg: Unauthorized delegate - only the pool delegate can perform this action

errors.name: DepositsDisabled
errors.msg: Deposits are currently disabled for this pool

errors.name: WithdrawalsDisabled
errors.msg: Withdrawals are currently disabled for this pool

errors.name: ExceedsMaxStake
errors.msg: User has exceeded the maximum stake per user limit

errors.name: InvalidVault
errors.msg: Invalid vault account

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: Invalid mint account

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: Invalid owner - account owner does not match expected value

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow occurred

errors.name: DivisionByZero
errors.msg: Division by zero attempted

types.name: LokalMintConfig
docs: State account that stores the configuration and metadata for the Lokal token mint
This account is owned by the program and stores essential mint information

fields.name: mint
docs: The public key of the mint account for Lokal tokens

fields.name: mint_authority_bump
docs: The bump seed for the PDA that acts as mint authority
This ensures the program has full control over token minting

fields.name: config_bump
docs: The bump seed for this config account's PDA

fields.name: update_authority
docs: The authority that can update mint configuration (typically program deployer)

fields.name: total_supply
docs: Total supply of Lokal tokens ever minted
Used for tracking and analytics purposes

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades (64 bytes)

types.name: MerchantAccount
docs: Merchant account that stores merchant-specific information and settings
This account tracks participating merchants and their reward configurations

fields.name: merchant_wallet
docs: The merchant's wallet public key for receiving payments

fields.name: name
docs: The merchant's display name

fields.name: category
docs: The merchant's category (e.g., "restaurant", "bookstore", "coffee_shop")

fields.name: cashback_rate
docs: Cashback percentage (in basis points, e.g., 500 = 5%)

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether the merchant is currently active

fields.name: total_transactions
docs: Total number of transactions processed for this merchant

fields.name: total_rewards_distributed
docs: Total amount of tokens distributed as rewards for this merchant

fields.name: total_volume
docs: Total purchase volume (in Indonesian Rupiah IDR) processed

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when merchant was registered

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed for this merchant account's PDA

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades (32 bytes)

types.name: PoolConfig
docs: Configuration parameters for the voucher staking pool

fields.name: min_stake_amount
docs: Minimum amount required to stake

fields.name: max_stake_per_user
docs: Maximum amount that can be staked per user

fields.name: deposits_enabled
docs: Whether the pool accepts new deposits

fields.name: withdrawals_enabled
docs: Whether users can withdraw/redeem

fields.name: apy_basis_points
docs: Annual percentage yield (in basis points, e.g., 1200 = 12%)

types.name: PoolState
docs: Main pool state account for voucher staking
Tracks overall pool metrics and configuration

fields.name: pool_authority
docs: The authority that can manage the pool (admin)

fields.name: pool_delegate
docs: The delegate authority that can execute deposits on behalf of users

fields.name: vault_ata
docs: The vault token account that holds staked voucher tokens

fields.name: voucher_mint
docs: The mint address of the voucher token (LOKAL token)

fields.name: config
docs: Pool configuration parameters

fields.name: total_voucher_staked
docs: Total amount of voucher tokens currently staked in the pool

fields.name: total_sol_staked
docs: Total SOL/WSOL staked (after swaps)

fields.name: total_yield_earned
docs: Total yield earned (in SOL/WSOL)

fields.name: total_stakers
docs: Number of unique stakers

fields.name: reward_index
docs: Reward index for calculating proportional yields

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when pool was created

fields.name: last_yield_update
docs: Timestamp of last yield update

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed for this pool state PDA

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades (64 bytes)

types.name: PurchaseTransaction
docs: Purchase transaction record for tracking and analytics
This account stores details of each purchase transaction including token redemptions

fields.name: customer
docs: The customer's wallet public key

fields.name: merchant
docs: The merchant's account public key

fields.name: fiat_amount
docs: Fiat purchase amount in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR)

fields.name: redeemed_token_amount
docs: Amount of tokens redeemed as payment (0 if none)

fields.name: total_value
docs: Total transaction value (fiat + token value in IDR)

fields.name: reward_amount
docs: Reward tokens minted for this purchase

fields.name: cashback_rate
docs: Cashback rate applied (in basis points)

fields.name: used_tokens
docs: Whether tokens were used in this transaction

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the transaction

fields.name: transaction_id
docs: Transaction signature for reference

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed for this transaction account's PDA

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades (16 bytes)

types.name: TokenTransfer
docs: Token transfer record for tracking P2P transfers
This account stores details of token transfers between users

fields.name: from
docs: The sender's public key

fields.name: to
docs: The recipient's public key

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of tokens transferred

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the transfer

fields.name: transaction_id
docs: Transfer transaction signature for reference

fields.name: memo
docs: Optional memo/note for the transfer

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed for this transfer account's PDA

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades (16 bytes)

types.name: UserStakeRecord
docs: Individual user stake record
Tracks each user's staking position and rewards

fields.name: user
docs: The user who owns this stake

fields.name: pool
docs: The pool this stake belongs to

fields.name: staked_amount
docs: Amount of voucher tokens staked by this user

fields.name: user_reward_index
docs: User's reward index snapshot (for yield calculations)

fields.name: total_yield_claimed
docs: Total yield claimed by this user

fields.name: staked_at
docs: Timestamp when user first staked

fields.name: last_action_at
docs: Timestamp of last stake/unstake action

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed for this user stake record PDA

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades (32 bytes)
